content.alkitab-terjemahan-baru: Sebab Allah memberikan kepada kita bukan roh ketakutan, melainkan roh yang membangkitkan kekuatan, kasih dan ketertiban.
content.king-james-version: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
content.new-international-version: For the Spirit God gave us does not make us timid, but gives us power, love and self-discipline.

content.alkitab-terjemahan-baru: Janganlah takut, sebab Aku menyertai engkau, janganlah bimbang, sebab Aku ini Allahmu; Aku akan meneguhkan, bahkan akan menolong engkau; Aku akan memegang engkau dengan tangan kanan-Ku yang membawa kemenangan.
content.king-james-version: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
content.new-international-version: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

content.alkitab-terjemahan-baru: Marilah kepada-Ku, semua yang letih lesu dan berbeban berat, Aku akan memberi kelegaan kepadamu.
content.king-james-version: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
content.new-international-version: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.

content.alkitab-terjemahan-baru: Aku telah mencari Tuhan, lalu Ia menjawab aku, dan melepaskan aku dari segala kegentaranku.
content.king-james-version: I sought the Lord, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.
content.new-international-version: I sought the Lord, and he answered me; he delivered me from all my fears.

content.alkitab-terjemahan-baru: Apabila kamu menjadi marah, janganlah kamu berbuat dosa: janganlah matahari terbenam, sebelum padam amarahmu.
content.king-james-version: Be ye angry, and sin not: let not the sun go down upon your wrath.
content.new-international-version: In your anger do not sin: Do not let the sun go down while you are still angry.

content.alkitab-terjemahan-baru: Orang yang sabar besar pengertiannya, tetapi siapa cepat marah membesarkan kebodohan.
content.king-james-version: He that is slow to wrath is of great understanding: but he that is hasty of spirit exalteth folly.
content.new-international-version: Whoever is patient has great understanding, but one who is quick-tempered displays folly.

content.alkitab-terjemahan-baru: Janganlah hendaknya kamu khawatir tentang apa pun juga, tetapi nyatakanlah dalam segala hal keinginanmu kepada Allah dalam doa dan permohonan dengan ucapan syukur.
content.king-james-version: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
content.new-international-version: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

content.alkitab-terjemahan-baru: Serahkanlah segala kekuatiranmu kepada-Nya, sebab Ia yang memelihara kamu.
content.king-james-version: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
content.new-international-version: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.

content.alkitab-terjemahan-baru: Kasih itu sabar; kasih itu murah hati; ia tidak cemburu. Ia tidak memegahkan diri dan tidak sombong.
content.king-james-version: Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up.
content.new-international-version: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.

content.alkitab-terjemahan-baru: Hati yang tenang menyegarkan tubuh, tetapi iri hati membusukkan tulang.
content.king-james-version: A sound heart is the life of the flesh: but envy the rottenness of the bones.
content.new-international-version: A heart at peace gives life to the body, but envy rots the bones.

content.alkitab-terjemahan-baru: Bersukacitalah dalam pengharapan, sabarlah dalam kesesakan, dan bertekunlah dalam doa!
content.king-james-version: Rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer;
content.new-international-version: Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.

content.alkitab-terjemahan-baru: Engkau memberitahukan kepadaku jalan kehidupan; di hadapan-Mu ada sukacita berlimpah-limpah, di tangan kanan-Mu ada nikmat senantiasa.
content.king-james-version: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
content.new-international-version: You make known to me the path of life; you will fill me with joy in your presence, with eternal pleasures at your right hand.
